hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Salamah, Ummul Mu'minin: I used to wear gold ornaments. I asked: Is that a treasure (kanz), Messenger of Allah? He replied: whatever reaches a quantity on which zakat is payable is not a treasure (kanz) when the zakat is paid

chapter.ara-name: باب الْكَنْزِ مَا هُوَ وَزَكَاةِ الْحُلِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: On The Meaning Of Kanz (Treasure) And Zakat On Jewellery
